staffdatamodel

Class LeaveRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • observertestharness.IObserverFunctions
      • staffdatamodel.LeaveRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IObserver, ISubject

    public class LeaveRecord
extends IObserverFunctions
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class holds the details of all the requests made by the member of staff with which it is associated.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ALLOWANCE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LeaveRecord()
      Creates a new, empty ArrayList object and sets the days left to the standard leave allocation (see the relevant class constant).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRequest(Request newRequest)
      Adds the provided request to the leave records list of requests
      void approveRequest(int index)
      Marks the leave request at the specified index as APPROVED by a manager and if the request is for ANNUAL leave decrements the number of remaining days of annual leave by the duration of the approved request.
      void clearAll()
      Removes all leave requests made so far and resets the number of available annual leave days to the annual entitlement defined by the class constant ALLOWANCE
      void declineRequest(int index)
      Marks the leave request at the specified index as DECLINED by a manager and if the request is for ANNUAL leave AND HAD ALREADY BEEN APPROVED it increments the number of remaining days of annual leave by the duration of the approved request.
      int getDaysLeft()
      Accessor to retrieve the total number of un-used annual leave days
      Request getRequestAt(int index)
      Accessor to retrieve the leave request item specified by the index parameter
      int size()
      Accessor to retrieve the total number of leave requests that have been made
      java.lang.String toString()

        public static final int ALLOWANCE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • LeaveRecord

        public LeaveRecord()
        Creates a new, empty ArrayList object and sets the days left to the standard leave allocation (see the relevant class constant).

    • Method Detail

      • addRequest

        public void addRequest(Request newRequest)
        Adds the provided request to the leave records list of requests
        Parameters:
        newRequest - - A Request object being the leave request to add to the list

      • getRequestAt

        public Request getRequestAt(int index)
        Accessor to retrieve the leave request item specified by the index parameter
        Parameters:
        index - - A zero based index value specifying the item required from the list
        Returns:
        - The leave request at the specified index or NULL if no request can be found.

      • approveRequest

        public void approveRequest(int index)
        Marks the leave request at the specified index as APPROVED by a manager and if the request is for ANNUAL leave decrements the number of remaining days of annual leave by the duration of the approved request. The approval of an ANNUAL leave request will only succeed if sufficient un-used annual leave allowance is available.
        Parameters:
        index - - A zero based index value specifying the item to approve from the list

      • declineRequest

        public void declineRequest(int index)
        Marks the leave request at the specified index as DECLINED by a manager and if the request is for ANNUAL leave AND HAD ALREADY BEEN APPROVED it increments the number of remaining days of annual leave by the duration of the approved request.
        Parameters:
        index - - A zero based index value specifying the leave request to decline from the list

      • clearAll

        public void clearAll()
        Removes all leave requests made so far and resets the number of available annual leave days to the annual entitlement defined by the class constant ALLOWANCE

      • size

        public int size()
        Accessor to retrieve the total number of leave requests that have been made
        Returns:
        - An int being the total number of leave requests recorded on the Leave Record

      • getDaysLeft

        public int getDaysLeft()
        Accessor to retrieve the total number of un-used annual leave days
        Returns:
        - int being the number of remaining days that the employee is entitled to as annual leave.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
